title: BKLYN Clay
description: a modern ceramics studio for potters, artists, production clayworkers, and hobbyists, with the first community Gas Kiln in Brooklyn.

title: Ace Hotel
description: Ace Hotel New York lives in a historic, turn-of-the-century building in Midtown Manhattan, invested with the spirit of its surroundings, the culture of the city and the ancient bones of the building.

title: Distinguished Concerts International New York
description: Distinguished Concerts International New York (DCINY) is the leading producer of dynamically charged musical excellence.

title: La Cigogne
description: French restaurant created by Jeremy Andre and Damien Frey - Located in Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn

title: League of Kitchens
description: An immersive culinary adventure in NYC where immigrants teach intimate cooking workshop in their homes.

title: LoLo's Seafood Shack
description: LoLo's Seafood Shack offers Caribbean Street Eats like Conch Fritters alongside Classic New England favorites like Shrimp + Snow Crab Steampots with our signature sauces.

title: Pinot's Palette
description: An unforgettable evening of friends, fun, beer, wine and painting in Brooklyn! We provide everything you need for a great night out.

title: The Barrow Group
description: The Barrow Group offers theatre patrons and performing arts students an artistic experience focused on simplicity, clarity, and spontaneity.

title: VOLTA NY
description: VOLTA NY is a contemporary art fair comprised of solo projects by leading and emerging international artists.
